attributes.action: Minimum 5 years imprisonment for anyone assaulting an emergency worker
attributes.additional_details:
Our emergency services have been hailed as heroes during the covid pandemic yet now in the midst of it we are seeing police officers been assaulted on a daily basis while trying to maintain order.
Enough is enough it’s time a suitable deterrent was in place and an example made of anyone who assaults an emergency worker wether they be a police officer fireman paramedic or worker in the NHS
attributes.background: Assaults on our emergency workers should be severely punished with a minimum sentence of 5 years to act as a deterrent we the British public have had enough of seeing our heroes assaulted its time the government acted and gave the emergency services the support they so desperately need
